properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 030200Z TO 100159Z NOV BY
   M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND M/V NPS OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING 300 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-22.50S 039-55.47W, 22-19.57S 040-00.23W,
   22-25.48S 040-03.17W, 22-28.68S 039-58.30W.
   TWO MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2580/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 100259Z NOV 12.
